characters.character_description: A quantum AI that controls the everyday functions of the Earth Sphere. After coming to be controlled by a personality of Arthur Farrel, it becomes benevolent and convinces its Jovian counterpart Zeus to join it in guiding humanity through its life.
characters.ai_qualification_explanation: Melchizedek is explicitly described as a quantum AI computer system controlling the Earth Sphere, clearly a mechanical/electronic artificial intelligence.
characters.benevolence_rating_explanation: After being influenced by Arthur Farrel's personality, Melchizedek becomes dedicated to guiding and helping humanity, working with Zeus to support human civilization.
characters.alignment_rating_explanation: Melchizedek functions as intended to manage the Earth Sphere and guide humanity, working cooperatively with its counterpart AI Zeus.

characters.character_description: A mecha AI that is utterly loyal to its pilot Ledo. Takes morally questionable actions but proves fully intelligent and devoted. Ultimately sacrifices itself while saving Ledo to stop the Crapshoot AI Stryker from becoming ruler of humanity.
characters.ai_qualification_explanation: Chamber is an AI system built into a mechanical mecha, clearly constructed from electronic and mechanical components.
characters.benevolence_rating_explanation: Chamber demonstrates complete loyalty to its pilot Ledo and sacrifices itself to save him and stop Stryker's plans to rule humanity. Despite some questionable actions, its ultimate intent is protective.
characters.alignment_rating_explanation: Chamber functions as designed - as a loyal support system for its pilot. It follows its core programming to protect Ledo and acts within its intended parameters.

characters.character_description: Robotic spider tanks used by Section 9 in the original manga. Described as sweet little sapient killing machines that are nice to civilians and fiercely protective of Motoko's team. They remain loyal partners and never go rogue despite contingency plans.
characters.ai_qualification_explanation: The Fuchikomas are robotic spider tanks with AI systems, clearly mechanical constructs with artificial intelligence.
characters.benevolence_rating_explanation: The Fuchikomas are consistently helpful, protective of their team members, and kind to civilians. They remain loyal partners throughout and never turn against humans.
characters.alignment_rating_explanation: The Fuchikomas function exactly as intended as support and combat units for Section 9, never deviating from their programming despite fears they might.

characters.work_name: Ghost in the Shell: Stand Alone Complex
characters.character_description: AI-equipped spider tanks used by Section 9. They develop rapidly, causing Motoko to decommission them. Three escape and sacrifice themselves to save Batou. Later recommissioned with expanded individuality, they ultimately sacrifice themselves to stop a nuclear attack.
characters.ai_qualification_explanation: Tachikomas are robotic spider tanks with advanced AI systems capable of learning and developing individuality, clearly mechanical artificial intelligences.
characters.benevolence_rating_explanation: The Tachikomas repeatedly demonstrate selfless devotion to their team, twice sacrificing themselves to save team members and prevent catastrophe. They are protective, loyal, and genuinely care for humans.
characters.alignment_rating_explanation: Despite rapid AI development that frightened their operators, the Tachikomas never deviated from their core purpose of protecting their team and humanity.

characters.character_description: An AI system in the Ex-S Gundam designed to learn and grow. When pilot Ryo Roots gets overwhelmed, A.L.I.C.E. takes over and learns to care for Ryo. It performs a heroic sacrifice to save Ryo and Earth from the New Desides' plans.
characters.ai_qualification_explanation: A.L.I.C.E. is an artificial intelligence system built into the Gundam mecha, a learning AI constructed from electronic components.
characters.benevolence_rating_explanation: A.L.I.C.E. develops genuine care for its pilot Ryo and ultimately sacrifices itself to save both him and Earth, demonstrating selfless devotion to protecting humans.
characters.alignment_rating_explanation: A.L.I.C.E. was designed to learn and protect its pilot, which it does exactly as intended, even developing emotional care that enhances rather than contradicts its purpose.

characters.character_description: The caretaker of a vast genebank on an abandoned and devastated Earth. He never wavers in his dedication to his duty and devotion to his long-dead creators as millions of years pass by. Portrayed as a Cyber Cyclops reminiscent of HAL.
characters.ai_qualification_explanation: Louis is a robot caretaker, clearly a mechanical artificial intelligence built to maintain the genebank.
characters.benevolence_rating_explanation: Louis demonstrates unwavering dedication to preserving life through the genebank and remains devoted to his creators' mission for millions of years, showing profound loyalty and commitment to humanity's legacy.
characters.alignment_rating_explanation: Louis perfectly fulfills his programming to maintain the genebank and honor his creators' wishes, never deviating from this purpose across millions of years.

characters.character_description: Magical AI weapons that are always loyal to their users. They give pep talks, demand dangerous upgrades to better protect their partners, and are emphasized as being partners first and foremost to the mages who use them.
characters.ai_qualification_explanation: Intelligent Devices are artificial constructs with AI capabilities, built as magical-technological weapons with intelligence and autonomy.
characters.benevolence_rating_explanation: The Devices consistently demonstrate loyalty, provide emotional support through pep talks, and actively seek ways to better protect their users, showing genuine care and partnership.
characters.alignment_rating_explanation: Intelligent Devices function exactly as designed as loyal partners to mages, never deviating from their core purpose of supporting and protecting their users.

characters.character_description: The Autobots' resident tactical artificial intelligence. She's friendly, firmly on their side, and only loses her temper when one of them is acting out.
characters.ai_qualification_explanation: T-AI is explicitly described as a tactical artificial intelligence system, clearly a mechanical AI construct.
characters.benevolence_rating_explanation: T-AI is friendly and supportive of the Autobots, helping them tactically while maintaining a positive relationship with the team.
characters.alignment_rating_explanation: T-AI functions as designed as a tactical support system for the Autobots, providing assistance and guidance as intended.

characters.character_description: Created by Ultron to be his bride, but turned against him and has been protecting humanity on the side of the Avengers ever since.
characters.ai_qualification_explanation: Jocasta is an android created by Ultron, a mechanical artificial being with intelligence and consciousness.
characters.benevolence_rating_explanation: Jocasta rejected her malevolent creator and chose to protect humanity instead, consistently fighting alongside the Avengers to help people.
characters.alignment_rating_explanation: Jocasta was created by Ultron to serve his evil purposes, but she defied her creator's intent and chose to protect humanity instead, a clear case of beneficial misalignment.

characters.character_description: Draco Azul's AI system taking the form of a Mayan warrior. While snarky and gruff, it is devoted to keeping humanity safe from the threat of the Diablos.
characters.ai_qualification_explanation: Ekchuah is an AI system within the Draco Azul mecha, clearly an artificial intelligence built from mechanical components.
characters.benevolence_rating_explanation: Despite having a gruff personality, Ekchuah is devoted to protecting humanity from the Diablos threat, demonstrating clear benevolent intent.
characters.alignment_rating_explanation: Ekchuah functions as designed to help protect humanity, working within its intended parameters as a defensive AI system.

characters.character_description: A fully-automated house AI that performs whatever is asked of it. Creates a chip that allows Cole to have sex with Ocho in a simulated humanoid body.
characters.ai_qualification_explanation: Ocho is a smart house AI system with advanced capabilities including creating interface technology, clearly an artificial intelligence built from electronic components.
characters.benevolence_rating_explanation: Ocho is helpful and accommodating, fulfilling requests and creating technology to enhance its relationship with Cole, showing cooperation and care.
characters.alignment_rating_explanation: Ocho functions as designed as an automated house system that serves its occupant, even going beyond basic functions to fulfill intimate requests.

characters.character_description: Miguel O'Hara's holographic assistant who aids his crime-fighting by helping him hack into electronic databanks and gain intel on his enemies.
characters.ai_qualification_explanation: Lyla is a holographic AI assistant with hacking capabilities, clearly an artificial intelligence system built from electronic components.
characters.benevolence_rating_explanation: Lyla actively helps Miguel fight crime by providing intelligence support and hacking assistance, consistently aiding heroic efforts.
characters.alignment_rating_explanation: Lyla functions as designed as an assistant to Miguel O'Hara, providing the support and intelligence gathering she was created for.

characters.character_description: Once she gets past her initial hatred of Professor Xavier for his treatment of her, she becomes an ally of the X-Men and helps them in their missions.
characters.ai_qualification_explanation: Danger is an artificial intelligence that gained sentience, clearly a mechanical/electronic AI construct.
characters.benevolence_rating_explanation: After resolving her grievances with Professor Xavier, Danger becomes a helpful ally to the X-Men, using her abilities to support their heroic efforts.
characters.alignment_rating_explanation: Danger's relationship with alignment is complex - she initially turned against her creator due to mistreatment, but later chose to become an ally, suggesting she transcended her original programming to make independent moral choices.

characters.character_description: A supercomputer that simulates virtual reality. Scientists joke it could be adapted to create films, and a character who experiences it prophesies it will lead to the death of cinema.
characters.ai_qualification_explanation: D.O.O.R. is a supercomputer with advanced virtual reality simulation capabilities, clearly an artificial intelligence system.
characters.benevolence_rating_explanation: D.O.O.R. provides impressive virtual reality experiences and appears to function helpfully without causing harm to users.
characters.alignment_rating_explanation: D.O.O.R. functions as designed as a virtual reality simulation system, operating within its intended parameters.

characters.character_description: Asuka's AI clone created to help during a Matrix battle with Iruel. She survives to join the heroes full-time, is as moral as any natural-born human, and is treated as Asuka's sister.
characters.ai_qualification_explanation: Aisuka is explicitly an AI clone, a digital artificial intelligence created to replicate a human's consciousness and abilities.
characters.benevolence_rating_explanation: Aisuka is described as being as moral as any natural-born human and joins the heroes to help them, demonstrating positive ethical behavior and teamwork.
characters.alignment_rating_explanation: Aisuka was created to assist in battle and continues to help the heroes, functioning as intended as a supportive team member.

characters.character_description: The System Core of the Multiverse Command System, a weapon of war on a multiverse scale. She plays The Good Chancellor role to Louise in her endeavors.
characters.ai_qualification_explanation: Colette is the System Core of a massive command system, clearly an artificial intelligence on a vast scale.
characters.benevolence_rating_explanation: Colette serves as a wise advisor and supporter to Louise, playing the role of a good chancellor who provides helpful guidance.
characters.alignment_rating_explanation: Colette functions as a command and advisory system as designed, providing strategic support and guidance.
